name: Patrol Route
description: The Town Guard needs you to check the patrol route and report back on key locations.

dialogue.offer: I need someone to walk the patrol route and check that all the key locations are secure. Can you visit the weapon shop, magic shop, and inn for me?
dialogue.accept: Excellent! Visit each location and report back to me when you're done. Just walking through each place should be enough.
dialogue.decline: No problem, I'll find someone else for the patrol.
dialogue.progress: Have you completed the patrol route yet? I need reports from the weapon shop, magic shop, and inn.
dialogue.complete: Perfect! Your patrol report helps keep our town safe. Here's your payment.
dialogue.completed: Thanks again for helping with the patrol. The town is more secure because of people like you.
